0KE.F.summary: Kernel Holding S.A. operates as a diversified agricultural company in Ukraine, Europe, and North America. The company operates through three segments: Oilseed Processing, Infrastructure and Trading, and Farming. The Oilseed Processing segment is involved in the production, refining, bottling, marketing, and distribution of bottled sunflower oil; and produces and sells crude and refined sunflower oil in bulk, as well as meal products. The Infrastructure and Trading segment provides grain handling and transshipment services in the Chornomorsk port; grain and oilseed cleaning, drying, and storage services; and proprietary trading and silo services, as well as sourcing and merchandising services of wholesale sunflower oil and grains. The Farming segment engages in agricultural farming; and the production of corn, wheat, soybean, sunflower seed, and rapeseed. The company also exports its products. Kernel Holding S.A. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Kyiv, Ukraine.

ARO.L.short_name: ARRICANO REAL ESTATE PLC ORD EU
ARO.L.summary: Arricano Real Estate PLC, together with its subsidiaries, invests in, develops, and leases real estate properties in Ukraine and the Republic of Crimea. It develops and operates shopping and entertainment centers. As of December 31, 2019, it operated five shopping centers with a total leasable area of approximately 147,900 square meters in Kyiv, Simferopol, Zaporizhzhya, and Kryvyi Rig. The company was formerly known as Arricano Trading Limited and changed its name to Arricano Real Estate PLC in September 2012. Arricano Real Estate PLC was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Kyiv, Ukraine.

DBG.F.summary: Public Joint Stock Company ÂCenterenergo' operates as a power generating company in Ukraine. It operates 3 thermal power plants consisting of 18 coal-fired power units and 5 gas and fuel oil units with an installed capacity of approximately 7,695 MW. The company also provides thermal energy for heating, as well as hot water supply for the industrial enterprises and household consumers in Svitlodarsk and Ukrainka towns, and Komsomolske village. Public Joint Stock Company ÂCenterenergo' is based in Kyiv, Ukraine.

MPQ.F.summary: MHP SE, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells food and poultry products in Ukraine and internationally. It operates in four segments: Poultry & Related Operations, Grain Growing, Meat-Processing & Other Agricultural Operations, and European Operating. The Poultry & Related Operations segment produces and sells fresh and frozen chicken meats, vegetable oils, including sunflower and soybean, as well as mixed fodder under the Nasha Riaba and Ukrainian Chicken brands in Ukraine; and under the Qualiko, Ukrainian Chicken, ?ssilah, and Sultanah names to export markets. The Grain Growing segment grows crops for fodder production and sale to third parties. The Meat-Processing & Other Agricultural Operations segment produces and sells sausages, processed and cooked meats, convenience foods, and produce from cattle and milk operations under the Bashchinsky, Lehko!, Qualiko, and Sytni brands. The European Operating segment engages in the production and sale of chicken meat and processed poultry meat products under the PP and Poli brands. It is also involved in hatching eggs; and growing of corn, sunflower, and soybean seeds, as well as rape and wheat grains to third parties. The company was formerly known as MHP S.A. and changed its name to MHP SE in August 2017. MHP SE was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Kiev, Ukraine.

SPDI.L.summary: SPDI is a London listed property company focused on Emerging Europe (Romania, Bulgaria, Greece, Serbia) with a growing portfolio of prime commercial properties let to blue chip clients on long leases, which generates high yields and offers significant potential for capital growth thanks to highly favourable macro and regional property market fundamentals.

TR61.F.summary: TMM Real Estate Development Plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction and development of residential and business properties primarily in Kyiv and Kharkiv regions in Ukraine. The company undertakes residential, office, and commercial real estate projects; leases residential and commercial properties; and provides general contractor services to third parties. It also produces concrete; metal ware; windows and other glass constructions; and ventilating and air-conditioning systems, as well as offers engineering and maintenance services. In addition, the company offers various services, such as design, assemble, certification, commissioning, and servicing of communication, television, and buildings automatics systems, as well as fire control and security systems; and designs and installs low voltage circuits, computers, and telephone and television networks. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Kyiv, Ukraine. TMM Real Estate Development Plc is a subsidiary of TMM Holdings Ltd.

UK1.F.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Ukrtelecom provides fixed line telephony and Internet services primarily in Ukraine. The company offers fixed line services, including international, long-distance, and local telephony services; data transmission services and VPN construction services; Internet access services; IP-permanent connection through a dedicated line; hardware and virtual hosting services; dedicated non-commutated communication channels; videoconferencing; audio text services; and IPTV and other telecommunications services. It also provides ICT services, including cloud PBX services, cloud IT infrastructure leasing services, and DDoS attack protection services. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Kyiv, Ukraine. Public Joint-Stock Company Ukrtelecom is a subsidiary of LLC ÂESU'.

UKR.L.summary: Ukrproduct Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes dairy foods and beverages in Ukraine and internationally. The company operates in five segments: Branded Products, Beverages, Non-Branded Products, Distribution Services and Other, and Supplementary Products. The Branded Products segment provides processed cheese, hard cheese, packaged butter, and spreads. The Beverages segment offers kvass and other beverages. The Non-Branded Products segment provides skimmed milk powder (SMP) and other skimmed milk products. The Distribution services and Other segment engages in the resale of third-party goods; and provision of processing services. The Supplementary products segment offers grain crops. The company supplies its branded dairy products to retailers and wholesalers in Ukraine; and exports its intermediate-stage milk products, including SMP to Denmark, the Netherlands, Bulgaria, Japan, and Turkey. The company also provides logistics and distribution services to third parties in Ukraine. It offers its products under the Nash Molochnik, Narodniy Product, Molendam, and Vershkova Dolina trademarks. Ukrproduct Group Limited is headquartered in Kiev, Ukraine.
